extension.name: image
extension.caption: Image
extension.author: Lee Cher Yeong
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later
extension.description: Image field type accepts gif, png & jpg file and resize it according to the value set in the parameter before it is saved to Mosets Tree.

field.name: size
field.label: Max. width & height
field.description: Enter the maximum size of the width and height of the final resized image. Enter 0 to use the value configured for listing thumbnail's size.

field.name: maxFileSize
field.label: Max. File Size (in bytes)
field.description: The maximum file size for the uploaded file in bytes. Default is 3MB (3145728 bytes). Enter 0 for no limit. Note that your server may have a maximum upload limit.
